comments:
(RC3)Test case 17: Data explorer/Data source/Add JDBC data source/user name/password

Steps:
1. Add a jtds jar for data source (jtds-1.1.jar). 
2.Select another driver class for data source,such as sun.jdbc.odbc...
2. Type "jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://spmdb/gui" in database URL edit box
3. Type "dev_sh" in user name edit box 
5. Type "dev_sh" in password edit box 
6. Click on Finish
7. Click items which have value in properties area

Expected result:
sucess. No exception

Result:

Get a valid ChoiceSet, but not choices in that ChoiceSet.
Model's problem?

There are different method behaviors. 1) Do not create empty choice set if there are no choices. 2) create empty choice set even no choices.

New codes used solution 1. Fixed this problem.
